text.tspan: A technique that enables machines to mimic human behavior, most importantly
human intelligence, in order to solve problems and make decisions.
An AI technique that uses statistics to enable machines to improve with
experience and make predictions without being explicitly programmed.
An ML technique inspired by neurons that uses layers of weighted,
inter-connected nodes to learn patterns and relationships in data.
An ANN technique that uses many hidden layers to
A DL technique that uses self-attention to process
A transformer technique of pre-training on a large
corpus of text data and fine-tuning on a specific task.
A GPT technique utilizing self-supervised learning
A specific large language model developed
